DOC.brief_summary: Our study aim evaluate impact addition 20 mcg intrathecal clonidine combine spinalepidural labor analgesia local anesthetic consumption , labor performance maternal fetal well-being .
DOC.brief_title: Intrathecal Clonidine Addiction Combined Spinal Epidural Analgesia During Labor
DOC.criteria: Written maternal inform consent Singleton pregnancy Gestational age ≥ 37 week , ASA I BMI < 30 fetus cephalic presentation Suspect certainty fetal malformation , Presence condition preeclampsia , multiparity , preterm labor History adverse reaction α2 adrenergic agonist Nicotine addiction Chronic use opioid
